name: Alfred Dattner
introduction: Alfred Dattner (born 6 November 1902 and died 8 July 1993) was a Swiss racing driver. Having raced in the non-championship 1949 Swiss Grand Prix prior, Dattner entered a Simca-Gordini into the 1952 Swiss Grand Prix, which was part of the Formula One championship. However, he became ill before the race weekend and did not attend.
